文本对齐
.text-left { text-align: left; }

.text-center { text-align: center; }

.text-right { text-align: right; }

.text-nowrap { white-space: nowrap; } /* 单行排列，不折行 */
文本颜色

.text-muted { color: #777777; }

.text-primary { color: #337ab7; }

.text-success { color: #3c763d; }

.text-info { color: #31708f; }

.text-warning { color: #8a6d3b; }

.text-danger { color: #a94442; }

<p class="text-muted">.text-muted { color: #777777; }</p>
<p class="text-primary">.text-primary { color: #337ab7; }</p>
<p class="text-success">.text-success { color: #3c763d; }</p>
<p class="text-info">.text-info { color: #31708f; }</p>
<p class="text-warning">.text-warning { color: #8a6d3b; }</p>
<p class="text-danger">.text-danger { color: #a94442; }</p>
背景色

.bg-primary { color: #337ab7; }

.bg-success { color: #3c763d; }

.bg-info { color: #31708f; }

.bg-warning { color: #8a6d3b; }

.bg-danger { color: #a94442; }

<p class="bg-primary">.bg-primary { color: #337ab7; }</p>
<p class="bg-success">.bg-success { color: #3c763d; }</p>
<p class="bg-info">.bg-info { color: #31708f; }</p>
<p class="bg-warning">.bg-warning { color: #8a6d3b; }</p>
<p class="bg-danger">.bg-danger { color: #a94442; }</p>
浮动
/* Classes */
.pull-left {
    float: left !important;
}
.pull-right {
    float: right !important;
}
块级元素居中
/* Class */
.center-block {
    display: block;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
}

/* Usage as a mixin */
.element {
    .center-block();
}
清除浮动
 <div class="clearfix">...</div> 
.clearfix:before,
.clearfix:after {
    content: " ";
    display: table;
}
.clearfix:after {
    clear: both;
}
显示与隐藏
.show {
    display: block !important;
}
.hidden {
    display: none !important;
}
.invisible {
    visibility: hidden;
}
去除圆角
.border-radius-none {
    border-radius: 0!important;
}
.border-radius-none-all {
    border-radius: 0!important;
}
.border-radius-none-all * {
    border-radius: 0!important;
}
